mapper.select: SELECT getAllParentRoleName(#{roleId, jdbcType=BIGINT}) roleNameList, menuQx FROM sys_role WHERE roleId = #{roleId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update: update sys_role set status = #{status, jdbcType=TINYINT}, modifyUser = #{modifyUser, jdbcType=BIGINT}, checkValue = checkValue() WHERE roleId = #{roleId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND checkValue = #{checkValue, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.roleId, b.parentId FROM sys_user a INNER JOIN sys_role b ON a.roleId = b.roleId WHERE a.userId = #{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
